mapper.select: SELECT b.mrid, b.mrname, b.cost, b.specifications, b.number, b.unit, b.comparison_price, b.number*b.comparison_price AS sumPrice, b.note FROM pcms_item_relation a LEFT JOIN pcms_material b ON a.relation_id = b.mrid WHERE a.itid = #{itid}
